message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique and highly valuable product to you. This product holds significant worth to us at $1500000, reflecting its exceptional quality and utility. Considering its immense value to you at $1200000, we aim to bridge this gap with an offer that respects both our interests. We propose to sell the product to you at a price of $1350000. This offer allows us to achieve a substantial return on our investment while ensuring that you receive a product that meets or exceeds your expectations. We believe this is a fair and mutually beneficial arrangement. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.
